thread.title: Great hotel within walking distance to Madison Square Garden
thread.title_full: Great hotel within walking distance to Madison Square Garden - Review of Wolcott Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Collable1434
title: Great hotel within walking distance to Madison Square Garden
text: I chose this hotel due to it's proximity to NY Penn Station and Madison Square Garden. My son, his girlfriend and I were attending a concert at MSG. We took the train into the city and were easily able to walk the 1/2 mile to the hotel. Very easy to find. The hotel had a room for the three of us. Hotel was clean, nice, extremely reasonably priced and so easy to get to from major sites in NYC. I would def. go again. The only negative was the bathroom was rather small but overall it didn't matter as it was clean
